item.title: By: Katie
item.dc:creator: Katie
item.description:
Hi Sasha,
Sorry I've been AWOL for a little while and just spotted this. The cake would feed at least 20 I would say. I haven't done heaps of chocolate work either, but I would say for anyone wanting to do something like this for an occasion it's worth having a go at tempering with a small batch of chocolate. The main thing is to open the windows - it's so much easier in a cold environment.
Hope your cousin liked her cake! Katie
item.content:encoded:
Hi Sasha,

Sorry I’ve been AWOL for a little while and just spotted this. The cake would feed at least 20 I would say. I haven’t done heaps of chocolate work either, but I would say for anyone wanting to do something like this for an occasion it’s worth having a go at tempering with a small batch of chocolate. The main thing is to open the windows – it’s so much easier in a cold environment.

Hope your cousin liked her cake!
Katie

item.title: By: Sasha
item.dc:creator: Sasha
item.description:
Hi this cake looks fabulous I'm thinking if making this for my cousins 40th birthday party, how many people did it feed?
I might do a black forest version though as it's her favourite.
Is it worth practising the chocolate work first as don't want to mess it up. I do bake quite often but nothing with chocolate work. Thanks Sasha
item.content:encoded:
Hi this cake looks fabulous I’m thinking if making this for my cousins 40th birthday party, how many people did it feed?

I might do a black forest version though as it’s her favourite.

Is it worth practising the chocolate work first as don’t want to mess it up. I do bake quite often but nothing with chocolate work.
Thanks Sasha
